name: Homebase Center for Common Concerns
description: Homebase is a non-profit, public policy law firm dedicated to building community capacity to end homelessness and reduce poverty. They combine deep knowledge of homelessness, its causes and solutions, with practical experience designing and implementing programs that help people regain housing, improve health and wellness, and reclaim their dignity. In addition, they are nationally-recognized technical assistance providers, able to help states, regions, communities and individual agencies enhanc
